options.name: Wyrd Stone
options.description: The bearer’s model gains Hard Target(2).

options.name: Icon of the Infinite
options.description: The bearer can cast Hellfire (Hereditary Spell) as a Bound Spell(6+).

options.name: Wasteland Torch
options.description:
The bearer’s unit gains Strider (Ruins), First Strike(Flaming Attacks).

In addition, during Pre-game Selections, you may choose a single Field, Forest: the chosen Terrain Feature is changed to a Ruins, without changing size.

options.name: Zealots' Banner
options.description: Models in the bearer's unit gain Extra Support (3).

options.name: Burning Portent
options.description: AP set to 10. Flaming Attacks, Multiple Wounds(D3),

options.name: Symbol of Slaughter
options.description: +2 Att, +2 Agi.

options.name: Dark Familiar
options.description: Learned Spells cast by the model part gain +6" Range (Aura spells gain +3" Range instead).

options.name: Immortal Gauntlets
options.description: When Choosing Equipment and Abilities, choose one of the following Attack Attributes for the wearer’s Melee Attacks: Divine Attacks, Flaming Attacks, Magical Attacks. Duration: Round of Combat.

options.name: Veilgate Orb
options.description:
During Pre-game Selections, mark a point on the Battlefield within 24" of your Deployment Zone, and outside the opponent’s Deployment Zone, with a Gateway Marker.

One use only. At the start of a friendly Magic Phase, if the bearer’s unit was allowed to move in the preceding Movement Phase (ie. it is not Shaken, did not Ambush, did not fail a Charge, is Unengaged, etc.), you may remove it from the Battlefield and immediately place it back on the Battlefield with Ambush(friendly Gateway Marker, that was not placed during this Player Turn).

options.name: Lord of the Damned
options.description: Before rolling the Random Movement distance in the Movement Phase, friendly units entirely with Irredeemable within 18" of the bearer may choose to apply either Minimised or Maximised to the roll.

options.name: Abiding Spirit
options.description: Hard Target (1).

options.name: Brand of the Dragon
options.description: Fly,Light Troops,Swiftstride,Breath Attack(Str 4, AP 1, Flaming Attacks)

options.name: Emissary of Chaos
options.description: (D6),Stubborn,,Terror

options.name: Sorcerer Immortal
options.description: Veil Walker,Channel(1)

options.name: Unholy Avatar
options.description: +1 Strength, +1 Armour Penetration, and Divine Attacks

options.name: Daemonic Wings
options.description: +3 Cha, +3 Mob, Fly,,Swiftstride.

options.name: Dark Prelate
options.description: The bearer can cast Blood Curse (Occultism) and Pentagram of Pain (Occultism) as a Bound Spell(5+).

options.name: Entropic Aura
options.description:
Weapon Enchantments and Armour Enchantments carried by the bearer, by models in the bearer’s unit, and by models in units that are in contact with the bearer are ignored and ceases to be Enchanted.

Note: The weapon or shield still provides its mundane effects.

options.name: Luck of the Dark Gods
options.description: The bearer’s model gains Aegis(+1, max. 4+).

options.name: Idol of Spite
options.description: One use only. May be activated when Choosing Equipment and Abilities: the bearer gains +1 Att, +1 Str, and +1 AP, with Duration: Round of Combat.

options.name: Thrice-Forged
options.description: Arm set to 6.

options.name: Gladiator's Spirit
options.description: +1 Arm and Parry.

options.name: Envy
options.description: Charge Range and Pursue Distance rolls by units containing this Favour are Maximised.

options.name: Gluttony
options.description: The first time a model with this Favour is on the winning side of a combat, its model parts with Path of the Favoured gains +1 Str. Duration: Permanent.

options.name: Greed
options.description: The model part with Path of the Favoured gains Great Weapon, Halberd, Paired Weapons, and Weapon Master. A Chosen Lord with this Favour may take a second item from either the Artefacts category or the Potions and Scrolls category (but cannot take a second item from both categories).

options.name: Lust
options.description: The model gains Feigned Flight and Strider.

options.name: Pride
options.description: The model gains Disciplined. Discipline Tests taken by units containing this Favour are Minimised.

options.name: Sloth
options.description: Model gains Aegis (6+). In addition, if the model is Height 1–4 it gains Aegis (+1, max. 4+, against no Armour Save*).

options.name: Wrath
options.description: The model part gains First Strike (Hatred).
